meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound found in tobacco smoke and grilled meats.
meanings.sent1: Grilled meats can contain benzopyrenes, which are harmful chemicals.
meanings.sent2: Researchers have identified benzopyrenes in tobacco smoke as well.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the secret ingredient in his BBQ sauce was actually benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent4: Like hidden dangers, benzopyrenes lurk in the smoke of the grill.
meanings.sent5: The presence of benzopyrenes in the air was evident from the smoky aroma.

meanings.definition: Benzopyrenes are known to be carcinogenic.
meanings.sent1: Health experts warn about the dangers of exposure to carcinogenic benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent2: Studies have shown a direct link between cancer and benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent3: The detective suspected the mysterious substance found at the crime scene could be benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent4: Carcinogenic benzopyrenes are like silent assassins in the environment.
meanings.sent5: The dark side of benzopyrenes is their ability to trigger cancerous growths.

meanings.definition: Exposure to benzopyrenes has been linked to an increased risk of cancer.
meanings.sent1: Doctors advise reducing exposure to benzopyrenes to lower cancer risks.
meanings.sent2: The community was concerned about the rising cases of cancer due to benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's weakness turned out to be exposure to benzopyrenes instead of kryptonite.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of cancer loomed over those exposed to benzopyrenes.
meanings.sent5: The danger of cancer from benzopyrenes was as clear as day to the researchers.
